replies.replyComment: Swamin wahansa mehema qwata samawena buduhamuduruwo loketa niwana genawa mokada me loke minosunge hadawath ginigana nisa. Habay buduhamuduruwo agamak haduwe nha ethuma darshanayk thiyala giya... Namuth ada oba wahansela eeka agamak karagena minisunge manasawal wikruthakalla jathin athara asamagiya genenawa. Katawath bha thawath kenekwa agamakata harawana eka thamange kamathenmay sidda wenne oba wahansela eda idala minisunge manasawal wikurthi kala darmayen lokaya jayagrahanaya kara geniyana magada obala me penwane.... Budurajanan kduwa athahariya obala ada ee garu siurata muwawela ada minissu aulawanawa hadawathwala samaya ginibath kanawa mekada budurajun desu dahama budu rajun idiriyata angulimala enakota ethuma darmayen angulimala walakuwanam ay ada obalata meka darmayen jayagana bari... Obawahansela thawa kenejge agamakata wirudawa minissu aussa aussa dagalana kalin narakada me rate thiyena spa tika ganika madam kudu ganja walin wena wipatha nawathuwoth agama koy eketh deshanawa yahapathane.... Neda namuth agamika nayakayo kalayuththe lokayata haripara winashayen galawanaeka
